speciality.title: Best Diabetic Retinopathy treatment in India

comparison.title: Comparing Traditional Diabetic Retinopathy Surgery & Latest Diabetic Retinopathy Surgery

definition.title: What is Diabetic Retinopathy?
definition.content: Diabetic retinopathy is a diabetes-related complication that affects the blood vessels in the retina, the light-sensitive tissue at the back of the eye. If left untreated, it can lead to vision loss and even blindness. Laser treatment offers a minimally invasive and effective solution to manage this condition.

symptoms.title: Symptoms
listItems: Dark areas in the field of vision

treatment.title: Treatment Options
treatment.content: Depending on the severity of diabetic retinopathy, treatment options vary. Laser surgery is one of the most effective treatments for this condition.

prevention.title: Prevention
listItems: Control blood sugar, blood pressure, and cholesterol
